repository.name: EntityFramework.Docs
repository.description: Documentation for Entity Framework Core and Entity Framework 6

issue.title: JSON/Query: optimize casts to nvarchar(max) in json queries where possible

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body: We always cast to a type when we extract value from json column using JSON_VALUE, we possibly could skip the cast for stuff like strings

issue.title: JSON_VALUE query not able to use indexes

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
Using sample from docs sample: (only selecting Id and Name)

```sql
SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[Name]
FROM [Authors] AS [a]
WHERE 
CAST(JSON_VALUE([a].[Contact],'$.Address.City') AS nvarchar(max)) = N'Chigley'
```
=> generates table scan

Adding index base on [this doc](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/relational-databases/json/index-json-data?view=sql-server-ver16#example-index)

```sql
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Authors]
ADD vContactCity AS JSON_VALUE(Contact,'$.Address.City')

CREATE INDEX idx_soh_json_ContactCity
ON [dbo].[Authors](vContactCity)
INCLUDE(Name)
```
Above query still uses table scan.

(Using RC2 from NuGet.org)

This does not:

```sql
SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[Name]
FROM [Authors] AS [a]
WHERE 
JSON_VALUE([a].[Contact],'$.Address.City') = N'Chigley'
```

body: FYI, if the user doesn't include the cast in an index computed column, this causes SQL Server to do an index scan instead of a seek, which causes a **very** significant perf degradation. We should really prioritize this (and possibly even consider patching, if it's really low-risk). See https://github.com/roji/JsonColumnsPerf for more details.
And you cannot create indexes on nvarchar(MAX) columns...

issue.title: Fix to #28881 - Consider removing unnecessary CASTs around JSON_VALUE

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
We can remove cast for string scalars, other types maybe cause conversion issues in the generated sql.

Fixes #28881
